short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immediately alerts you if a site includes products that you might be allergic to

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool to helps you understand if any website or webpage might contain a product that the user might be allergic to.
The user first types what food or ingredients they are allergic to.
Once they add these, then any time they go to a new page, our tool goes over all the page and if it contains that ingredient or food it will alert the user, which could then decide if he leaves the site or confirms and stays on it.
